mn145:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn145:1.3: Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā puṇṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn145:2.1: “sādhu maṃ, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena ovādena ovadatu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
mn145:2.2: “Tena hi, puṇṇa, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn145:2.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā puṇṇo bhagavato paccassosi.
mn145:3.1: “Santi kho, puṇṇa, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
mn145:3.2: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
mn145:3.3: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
mn145:3.9: manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
mn145:3.10: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
mn145:3.11: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
mn145:4.1: Santi ca kho, puṇṇa, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
mn145:4.2: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
mn145:4.3: Tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato nandī nirujjhati.
mn145:4.5: Santi ca kho, puṇṇa, sotaviññeyyā saddā …
mn145:4.9: manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
mn145:4.10: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
mn145:4.11: Tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato nandī nirujjhati.
mn145:5.1: Iminā ca tvaṃ, puṇṇa, mayā saṅkhittena ovādena ovadito katarasmiṃ janapade viharissasī”ti?
mn145:5.2: “Imināhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena ovādena ovadito, atthi sunāparanto nāma janapado, tatthāhaṃ viharissāmī”ti.
mn145:5.5: Sace taṃ, puṇṇa, sunāparantakā manussā akkosissanti paribhāsissanti, tattha te, puṇṇa, kinti bhavissatī”ti?
mn145:5.6: “Sace maṃ, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā akkosissanti paribhāsissanti, tattha me evaṃ bhavissati:
mn145:5.7: ‘bhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, subhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, yaṃ me nayime pāṇinā pahāraṃ dentī’ti.
mn145:5.10: “Sace pana te, puṇṇa, sunāparantakā manussā pāṇinā pahāraṃ dassanti, tattha pana te, puṇṇa, kinti bhavissatī”ti?
mn145:5.11: “Sace me, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā pāṇinā pahāraṃ dassanti, tattha me evaṃ bhavissati:
mn145:5.12: ‘bhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, subhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, yaṃ me nayime leḍḍunā pahāraṃ dentī’ti.
mn145:5.15: “Sace pana te, puṇṇa, sunāparantakā manussā leḍḍunā pahāraṃ dassanti, tattha pana te, puṇṇa, kinti bhavissatī”ti?
mn145:5.16: “Sace me, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā leḍḍunā pahāraṃ dassanti, tattha me evaṃ bhavissati:
mn145:5.17: ‘bhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, subhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, yaṃ me nayime daṇḍena pahāraṃ dentī’ti.
mn145:5.20: “Sace pana te, puṇṇa, sunāparantakā manussā daṇḍena pahāraṃ dassanti, tattha pana te, puṇṇa, kinti bhavissatī”ti?
mn145:5.21: “Sace me, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā daṇḍena pahāraṃ dassanti, tattha me evaṃ bhavissati:
mn145:5.22: ‘bhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, subhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, yaṃ me nayime satthena pahāraṃ dentī’ti.
mn145:5.25: “Sace pana te, puṇṇa, sunāparantakā manussā satthena pahāraṃ dassanti, tattha pana te, puṇṇa, kinti bhavissatī”ti?
mn145:5.26: “Sace me, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā satthena pahāraṃ dassanti, tattha me evaṃ bhavissati:
mn145:5.27: ‘bhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, subhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, yaṃ maṃ nayime tiṇhena satthena jīvitā voropentī’ti.
mn145:5.30: “Sace pana taṃ, puṇṇa, sunāparantakā manussā tiṇhena satthena jīvitā voropessanti, tattha pana te, puṇṇa, kinti bhavissatī”ti?
mn145:5.31: “Sace maṃ, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā tiṇhena satthena jīvitā voropessanti, tattha me evaṃ bhavissati:
mn145:5.32: ‘santi kho bhagavato sāvakā kāye ca jīvite ca aṭṭīyamānā harāyamānā jigucchamānā satthahārakaṃ pariyesanti. Taṃ me idaṃ apariyiṭṭhaṃyeva satthahārakaṃ laddhan’ti.
mn145:6.2: Sakkhissasi kho tvaṃ, puṇṇa, iminā damūpasamena samannāgato sunāparantasmiṃ janapade viharituṃ.
mn145:7.1: Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena sunāparanto janapado tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
mn145:7.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena sunāparanto janapado tadavasari.
mn145:7.3: Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā puṇṇo sunāparantasmiṃ janapade viharati.
mn145:7.4: Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo tenevantaravassena pañcamattāni upāsakasatāni paṭivedesi, tenevantaravassena pañcamattāni upāsikasatāni paṭivedesi, tenevantaravassena tisso vijjā sacchākāsi.
mn145:7.5: Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo aparena samayena parinibbāyi.
mn145:8.1: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
mn145:8.2: “yo so, bhante, puṇṇo nāma kulaputto bhagavatā saṃkhittena ovādena ovadito so kālaṅkato.
mn145:8.4: “Paṇḍito, bhikkhave, puṇṇo kulaputto paccapādi dhammassānudhammaṃ, na ca maṃ dhammādhikaraṇaṃ viheṭhesi.
mn145:8.7: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
